comments.raw_text:
I see similar behavior on Windows 10 and Firefox 60.0.2.  Sometimes clicking the [X] button in the top right to close a window works, and sometimes it does not.  Clicking the [X] in the taskbar preview always works to close the window.

I'm not sure whether the original reporter meant "most recently opened window" or "only remaining window" when writing "Tried to close the last window".  I have noticed no pattern to when the close button works and when it does not.

I searched for related bugs, and the only one that looks similar to me is BUG#533091.
